newsitem.title: USA: Employee Solutions buys Employers Trust.
newsitem.headline: Employee Solutions buys Employers Trust.

text.p: Employee Solutions Inc said Wednesday it had acquired Employers Trust.
Employee Solutions did not disclose the purchase price but said in a statement it will pay five times Employers Trust's 1997 pre-tax earnings.
Employers Trust's has annualized revenues of about $50 million and leases about 2,000 employees to a client base consisting primarily of light industrial, transportation and construction companies.
Employee Solutions said it expects the acquisition will be accretive to 1997 earnings.
